description: The Jollof Cafe is a community-driven initiative in Brighton that fosters social engagement among migrants, refugees, asylum seekers, and local residents through shared meals. Launched in 2015, it addresses food insecurity while promoting solidarity and cultural exchange. Operating on a pay-as-you-feel basis, the cafe allows participants to enjoy high-quality, vegetarian meals, connect with their communities, and develop leadership skills, all while creating a welcoming space for diverse cultural interactions.
name: The Jollof Cafe
